page.title: 02PUBLIC TRANSPORT. A SURVEY
page.content: We stopped the first 10 people that we met in Malpas High Street and asked them about public transport and if they used it. 1.Do you have a car? 2 "YES" 8"NO" 2.Do you use the bus more than a car? 4 "YES" 6"NO". 3.What do you use the bus for? 9 used it for shopping trips into WHITCHURCH or CHESTER. 1 person used to get to work each morning and return home in the evening. 4. Do you prefer the bus to a car? 4 "YES" 4"NO" 2"EQUALLY THE SAME" 5. Which day(s) do you use the bus? MONDAY>0 TUESDAY>0 WEDNESDAY>2 THURSDAY>1 FRIDAY> 4 SATURDAY>3 SUNDAY>0. There is regular bus service from Malpas to Whitchurch and Chester every day.
